answers.answer: CWS are not a normal occurrance.  something is causing them, most likely some systemic condition.keep getting worked up.

question: In 2004 I had my first cotton wool spot and I was pg.  Eye surgeon ran blood work (MS, HIV, Lupus) and everything was fine.  In 8-05 I had another one.  He has scared me to death about this.  He wants to do chest xray (looking for lung disease), MS, Lupus, etc etc tests again.  Is it ALWAYS something horrible that causes these?   I am healthy.  I see a lot about diabetes.  Maybe I should get tested again even though my PG test came out ok when I had it then??  Any advise would be wonderful!  I can't sleep at night due to stress about this.  I also have ultrasound tomorrow for my gallbladder.....  Geesh. Falling apart!
title: Cotton wool spot
